dcterms:description: A large-scale AR shadow image dataset consisting of 3,000 quintuples, where each quintuple includes a synthetic image without the virtual object shadow, its corresponding image containing the virtual object shadow, a mask of the virtual object, a labeled real-world shadow matting, and its corresponding labeled occluder.
dcterms:title: Shadow-AR dataset

dcterms:creator: Tom√°s F Yago Vicente
Le Hou
Chen-Ping Yu
Minh Hoai
Dimitris Samaras
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of pairs of shadow images and corresponding shadow masks, used for training shadow detection models.
dcterms:title: SBU

dcterms:creator: Liangqiong Qu
Jiandong Tian
Shengfeng He
Yandong Tang
Rynson WH Lau
dcterms:description: A dataset containing pairs of shadow images and corresponding shadow-free images, used for shadow removal tasks.
dcterms:title: SRD

dcterms:creator: Jiejie Zhu
Kegan GG Samuel
Syed Z Masood
Marshall F Tappen
dcterms:description: A dataset for learning to recognize shadows in monochromatic natural images, consisting of shadow images and their corresponding annotations.
dcterms:title: UCF

dcterms:creator: Ruiqi Guo
Qieyun Dai
Derek Hoiem
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides paired regions for shadow detection and removal, containing shadow images and their corresponding shadow-free images.
dcterms:title: UIUC

dcterms:creator: Maciej Gryka
Michael Terry
Gabriel J Brostow
dcterms:description: A dataset for learning to remove soft shadows, containing images with soft shadows and their corresponding shadow-free images.
dcterms:title: LRSS

dcterms:creator: Jifeng Wang
Xiang Li
Jian Yang
dcterms:description: A dataset for jointly learning shadow detection and shadow removal, containing shadow images and their corresponding shadow-free images.
dcterms:title: ISTD

dcterms:creator: Angel X Chang
Thomas Funkhouser
Leonidas Guibas
Pat Hanrahan
Qixing Huang
Zimo Li
Silvio Savarese
Manolis Savva
Shuran Song
Hao Su
dcterms:description: An information-rich 3D model repository containing a large number of 3D models used for various applications including shadow generation.
dcterms:title: ShapeNet
